description: ImageTuner allows you to batch manipulate images in various ways including renaming, resizing, watermarking, and converting images. You can also sharpen and colorize your images or remove EXIF data.

In the application, you can add images to Image Tuner to create a list that will be processed. When you save the list, the application creates an ITF to store the paths to each file and information about each file.
NOTE: To create an ITF file, select File → New , add the image(s), then select File → Save as .
